short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do exercises to keep using Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension that periodically prompts the user to do a stretch/exercise/posture check. Set your own custom poses. Uses machine learning pose estimation via webcam. Runs after e.g. every 5ᵗʰ new tab opened (can be configured).
